name: tag
others_no_arg: $n casts about for someone to tag.
actor_found_target: >From nowhere, you pounce on $N and TAG $M remorselessly!  BWAHAHA!!!
others_found: $n dives from the shadows and TAGS $N.  $N IS IT!
target_found: $n pounces on you and >>> TAGS <<< you!  You're IT!
actor_auto: Who were you going to tag, then?
others_auto: Unable to catch anyone else, $n tags $mself.  Are you impressed?
